final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Clerks
        A([Patient registers in the hospital]) --> B[Record the data of each patient]
        B --> C{ParallelGateway}
        C --> D[Register the SSN of the patient]
        C --> E[Register the Name of the patient]
        C --> F[Register the Surname of the patient]
        D --> G{ParallelGateway}
        E --> G
        F --> G
        G --> H[Print referral document]
        H --> I[Archive the record in the file system]
        I --> J([Registration completed])
        H -.-> K[Referral Document]
        I -.-> L[Store record in data base]
    end
